results.title: As the Election Looms, Investors See Uncertainty. They Don’t Like It.
results.abstract: The stock market has been on a tear for much of 2020, but there is now more volatility as investors worry about the outcome of the presidential vote.

results.title: All Eyes Are on Pfizer as Trump Pushes for Vaccine by October
results.abstract: Despite slim chances that its vaccine will be ready by October, Pfizer has big incentives to hint that it might be.

results.title: Mr. DeMille, I’m Ready for Your Booze Stash
results.abstract: Dusty hunters seek valuable old bottles of whiskey and other spirits. This one found the collection of a lifetime.

results.title: Using Technology to Tailor Lessons to Each Student
results.abstract: Computer algorithms and machine learning are helping students succeed in math. Some experts see such efforts as a crucial next step in education.

multimedia.caption: Seventh grader Nina Mones, a student at Phoenix International Academy, initially struggled with math but new initiatives are helping her flourish.
multimedia.copyright: Caitlin O'Hara for The New York Times

results.title: Steven Mnuchin’s Deal Staved Off Catastrophe. Can He Make Another One?
results.abstract: Even many Trump critics credit his Treasury secretary with rescuing the economy from the pandemic. Will the White House and Congress keep him from doing it again?
des_facet: Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act (2020)

results.title: Duterte Lashes Out at Facebook After It Takes Down Fake Accounts
results.abstract: The Philippine leader, who harnessed the social network as he rose to power, is now making vague threats to shut it down.
results.byline: By Jason Gutierrez and Paul Mozur

multimedia.caption: “I allow you to operate here,” President Rodrigo Duterte of the Philippines said of Facebook on Monday. The company recently took down fake accounts that were promoting his policies, among other activity.
multimedia.copyright: Robinson Ninal Jr./Malacanang Presidential Photographers Division, via Associated Press
